titles.title: Pathway to Stable and Affordable Housing for All Act
Pathway to Stable and Affordable Housing for All Act
A bill to provide direct appropriations for certain housing programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary:
Pathway to Stable and Affordable Housing for All Act
This bill provides appropriations to the Department of Housing and Urban Development for several housing programs, including (1) Tenant-Based Rental Assistance, (2) the Housing Trust Fund, (3) the Continuum of Care Program, and (4) the Emergency Solutions Grants Program.
